mapper.insert: insert into login_device(user_id, serial_number, device_model, login_time, ip) values (#{userId}, #{serialNumber}, #{deviceModel}, now(), ip) on duplicate key update login_time = now()
mapper.select: select id, user_id, serial_number, device_model, login_time,ip from login_device where user_id = #{userId} and serial_number = #{serialNumber} limit 1
